title: rsincognito

comments.body: I have seen better looking ones. However I have not found where they can be bought

comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 23, 2023, 03:47:33 AMI have seen better looking ones. However I have not found where they can be bought  You're right (or I agree), these are better looking.

comments.author: Luke BookBear
comments.body: Or really I don't know.Â  They're both VERY cool looking, but in their own way (or in different ways).

comments.author: DirtyKeyboard
comments.body: I vote both are cool, but prefer the second pair.Â  I think the first pair has a nice Louis Vuitton look to it, except for the distortion on the heel.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: DirtyKeyboard on November 23, 2023, 04:03:34 AMI vote both are cool, but prefer the second pair.Â  I think the first pair has a nice Louis Vuitton look to it, except for the distortion on the heel.that is my main reason for not liking it - never liked LV garbage.

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: is it a real crocs brand? i dont see any recognition from crocs or announcement from crocs. Maybe a fake croc

comments.author: DirtyKeyboard
comments.body: Quote from: hoopstagaloop on November 23, 2023, 07:28:20 AMis it a real crocs brand? i dont see any recognition from crocs or announcement from crocs. Maybe a fake crocÂ  In the heel closeup you can see the crocs logo on the sports mode strap.Â  Not conclusive though, I suppose.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Thanks for sharing....love the design and am always collecting Bitcoin items....grabbed a few.

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: If I understand this correctly, it is a "Limited Pre-Order of 2,100 Units", not necessarily a limited edition of 2100 units...nice wording marketing/promotion thought...

comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on November 23, 2023, 11:21:25 AMIf I understand this correctly, it is a "Limited Pre-Order of 2,100 Units", not necessarily a limited edition of 2100 units...nice wording marketing/promotion thought...Â  So it is not limited to 2,100 pairs. They can reproduce it after pre order? ðŸ¤”

comments.author: JanEmil
comments.body: It will look good grilling a steak in the garden with them on.

This is just speculation according to the phraseology used in their X (Twitter) promo & listing description...If the shoe fits (no pun intended), we will be able to attach our Ledger devices as a Jibbitz/charm Â  Â  Â Â To answer your question I wrote to them and this is what they said..Â Â  Â  Hi There will only ever be 2100 of this edition of Bitcoin Crocs.It is possible at some point in the future a new version of Bitcoin Crocs will be made but there are no plans for this at the moment.
